ESRS 2 General disclosures
Strategy
Disclosure Requirement related to ESRS 2 SBM-2 - Interests and views of stakeholders
AR 4. Disclosure Requirement ESRS 2 SBM-2 requires the undertaking to provide an understanding
of whether and how it considers the role that its strategy and business model may play in
creating, exacerbating or mitigating significant material impacts on value chain workers, and
whether and how the business model and strategy are adapted to address such material
impacts.
